message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $9,500. I think it would be a valuable addition to your collection.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I understand your position, Bob, but the value of this item is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you at $8,500. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
